level.text: The library card may be used at the Martin Luther King Memorial Library (the central library), any branch library, and on bookmobiles.
The person to whom the card is issued is responsible for all use made of it.
Changes of address and lost or stolen cards shall be reported immediately.
A charge of one dollar ($1.00) shall be made to replace a lost library card.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: 27 DCRR ยง 1.2, 24 DCRR 11011, 11013-14 (June 30, 1978); as amended by 35 DCR 5584 (July 22, 1988).
